name: M Essentials Tenacious Tape Neoprene Patch
description: Fix a rip or torn spot in your wetsuit. Forms a durable and long-lasting repair, but it does need heat applied to make it bond. If you're in the field, you try the bottom of pot warmed over a camp stove or fire, but a meduim-hot iron is the ideal tool.Quick and durable repair solution for neoprene clothing and accerssories.Includes 15 x 25cm patch and heat shield for iron application.Abrasion resistant liner on patch material ensures a tough, permanent fix.
